meanings.definition: A wide way leading from one place to another, especially one with a specially prepared surface that vehicles can use.
meanings.sent1: The roads in our town are well-maintained and easy to drive on.
meanings.sent2: I take the same roads to work every day.
meanings.sent3: The roads seemed to have a mind of their own, directing me to the ice cream shop.
meanings.sent4: In life, we all navigate different roads to reach our goals.
meanings.sent5: The roads stretched out before us like ribbons of opportunity.

meanings.definition: A series of events or a course of action that leads to a particular outcome.
meanings.sent1: The roads to success are often filled with challenges.
meanings.sent2: She carefully planned her roads to achieve her dream of becoming a doctor.
meanings.sent3: The roads of fate twisted and turned, leading them to unexpected places.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship hit a bump in the road but eventually smoothed out.
meanings.sent5: The roads they took in their relationship ultimately led to a happy ending.
